description:
Shio and Akari find out Eiyu reads rom-coms.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Admiring Them? Feeling Lonely? School at Night? Fantasizing? Old Promises? Still Won`t Start a Rom-Com
Akogarete Ite mo Hitoribocchi de mo Yoru no Gakkou de mo Mousou Shite mo Yakusoku Shite mo Lovecome ni Naranai
憧れていてもひとりぼっちでも夜の学校でも妄想しても約束してもラブコメにならない
